project_descr: This Project aims to strengthen national structures to implement the UNCAC in Country. The Government of Belize will accede to the UNCAC in December 2016 and will then begin the implementation process.

outputs.output_descr: This project will holistically support the implementation of UNCAC nationally including amongst state, non-state actors and the general public.
donor_name: US Department of State, Office to monitor & combat Tracking in persons.

document_name: ProDOC Strengthening National Systems for UNCAC Implementation
Call For A University to Provide Legislative Drafting Course
Consultancy to Conduct a Study on the Gender Impacts of Corruption in Belize
Consultancy to develop an Advocacy Strategy and Plan for Implementation of UNCAC Belize
Consultancy to provide an Advocacy Course/Training for Implementation of UNCAC Belize
Provision of Good Governance Training to Children from Nine Municipalities in Belize

project_title: strengthening national systems for united nations convention against corruption implementation in belize
